item.title: Jorge Otero-Pailos: American Fence | Holtermann Fine Art
item.description: Like many other Londoners, I first heard of Jorge Otero-Pailos with his knockout The Ethics of Dust show in 2016, in which he applied, pulled off and displayed an absorbent latex panel across an entire wall of Westminster Hall. Under that spectacular medieval hammerbeam roof, the Spanish-born, US-based artist confronted us with the layered debris of centuries of our history. An unforgettable sight! Five years later, Otero-Pailos is showing in London again, digging into some more recent history.
